_source.productDescription: Australian rap icon Chillinit is hitting the red dirt this Summer, taking his boundless energy and smoked-out catalogue on the All Aussie Adventures Tour - a 25-date run spanning coastlines, country towns and everywhere in between.
_source.productShortDescription: Australian rap icon Chillinit is hitting the red dirt this Summer.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Offer multiple options for booking - web, email, phone
Offer a range of contact methods for receiving complaints
Accept the Companion Card
Employ people with disability

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people who are blind or have vision loss.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Have  Braille and tactile signage on all information and paths of travel
Provide information in large print
Use easy read fonts in your signage and communication materials (Helvetica and Arial)
Have handrails on all your stairways
Have Exit signs which are visible at a ground level (high level signs are difficult to see in a fire)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people with sufficient mobility to climb a few steps but who would benefit from fixtures to aid balance. (This includes people using walking frames and mobility aids)

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Use floors/coverings which are slip resistant, firm and smooth
Use non-slip tiles in the bathroom or slip resistant matting
Have grab rails in the bathroom

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people who use a wheelchair.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Have step free outdoor pathways (includes picnic areas, barbecues and shelters)
Have a step free main entrance to the building and/or reception area (includes ramps or slopes with a maximum gradient of 1:14, otherwise are too steep for wheelchairs)
Have step free access to restaurant, lounge and bar
Have step free access to the conference or function room
Have accessible seating areas in theatrette
Have doorways which are easy to open and have lever handles (doorways 850mm or wider when open and not heavy)
Have an accessible public toilet which is unlocked
Have wheelchair accessible picnic tables (picnic tables require 720mm knee clearance and 800mm maximum height)
Have wheelchair access to amusements and activities including boats and bush trails (includes tour rides, skyways, trolley cars, flying fox, amusement rides and boating)
Have at least one wheelchair accessible parking space with wheelchair accessible signage clearly displayed (International standards are 3200mm wide x 2500 mm high)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people with allergies and intolerances.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Modify your cooking and cleaning practices to cater for people with food allergies or chemical intolerances (could include menus with meals free from: nuts, dairy, seafood, eggs, gluten etc)
Train your staff to respond to allergic reactions
Adhere to The Food Authority requirements for allergy management in food preparation
Have equipment to respond to anaphylactic shock such as epi–pens and defibrillator

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: An access and inclusion statement is available on the business website.

productComments.commentText: Australian rap icon Chillinit is hitting the red dirt this Summer, taking his boundless energy and smoked-out catalogue on the All Aussie Adventures Tour - a 25-date run spanning coastlines, country towns and everywhere in between.

Die australische Rap-Ikone Chillinit erobert diesen Sommer die australischen Weiten und präsentiert seine unbändige Energie und seinen abgefahrenen Katalog auf der All Aussie Adventures Tour – einer 25-tägigen Tournee, die von Küsten über ländliche Städte bis hin zu allem dazwischen führt.

L'icône du rap australien Chillinit débarque sur la terre battue cet été, emmenant son énergie débordante et son répertoire enfumé lors de l'All Aussie Adventures Tour - une série de 25 dates qui sillonneront les côtes, les villes de campagne et tous les endroits intermédiaires.

Ikon rap Australia Chillinit akan beraksi di jalanan tanah merah musim panas ini, menyalurkan energinya yang tak terbatas dan katalognya yang lengkap dalam All Aussie Adventures Tour - tur 25 tanggal yang mencakup garis pantai, kota-kota pedesaan, dan semua tempat di antaranya.
オーストラリアのラップ界のアイコン、チリニットがこの夏、尽きることのないエネルギーとスモークアウトのカタログを携えて、海岸線、田舎町、その間のあらゆる場所で 25 日間を巡る「オール オージー アドベンチャー ツアー」に挑みます。

L'icona del rap australiano Chillinit scenderà in pista quest'estate, portando la sua energia sconfinata e il suo repertorio affumicato nell'All Aussie Adventures Tour, un tour di 25 date che toccherà coste, città di campagna e tutto ciò che sta nel mezzo.

El ícono del rap australiano Chillinit llega a Australia este verano, llevando su energía desbordante y su catálogo de temas contundentes al All Aussie Adventures Tour, una gira de 25 fechas que abarca costas, pueblos rurales y todos los lugares intermedios.
호주의 랩 아이콘 칠리닛이 이번 여름 끝없는 에너지와 연기로 가득 찬 음악적 스펙트럼을 펼치며 해안선 시골 마을 그리고 그 사이의 모든 곳을 아우르는 25개 도시를 순회하는 All Aussie Adventures 투어에 나섭니다.
今年夏天，澳大利亚说唱偶像 Chillinit 将带着他无限的活力和迷幻的音乐作品踏上“全澳冒险之旅”的征程，这场为期 25 天的巡演将遍及海岸线、乡村小镇以及两者之间的所有地方。
今年夏天，澳洲饒舌偶像 Chillinit 將帶著他無限的活力和迷幻的音樂作品踏上「全澳冒險之旅」的旅程，這場為期 25 天的巡演將遍及海岸線、鄉村小鎮以及兩者之間的所有地方。

O ícone do rap australiano Chillinit vai invadir a Austrália neste verão, levando sua energia inesgotável e seu repertório intimista para a turnê All Aussie Adventures - uma série de 25 shows que passarão por litorais, cidades do interior e todos os lugares entre eles.

_source.productName: Monster Truck Mayhem Thrill and Stunt Show Caboolture
_source.productDescription:
Monster Truck Mayhem Thrills and Stunts Show offers an unforgettable family experience. 

Visitors see massive monster trucks perform wheelstands, crush cars, and execute thrilling stunts. 

The show also features high-energy performances that keep audiences on the edge of their seats. 

The combination of adrenaline-pumping action, close-up views of powerful vehicles, and family-friendly entertainment makes this event unique. 

Monster Truck Mayhem Thrills and Stunts Show creates lasting memories for fans of all ages and celebrates the excitement of motorsport in a safe and engaging environment.
_source.productShortDescription: Monster Truck Mayhem Thrills and Stunts Show offers an unforgettable family experience.

productComments.commentText:
Monster Truck Mayhem Thrills and Stunts Show offers an unforgettable family experience. 

Visitors see massive monster trucks perform wheelstands, crush cars, and execute thrilling stunts. 

The show also features high-energy performances that keep audiences on the edge of their seats. 

The combination of adrenaline-pumping action, close-up views of powerful vehicles, and family-friendly entertainment makes this event unique. 

Monster Truck Mayhem Thrills and Stunts Show creates lasting memories for fans of all ages and celebrates the excitement of motorsport in a safe and engaging environment.

Pertunjukan Monster Truck Mayhem Thrills and Stunts menawarkan pengalaman keluarga yang tak terlupakan.

Para pengunjung menyaksikan truk-truk monster raksasa melakukan aksi berdiri di atas roda, menghancurkan mobil, dan melakukan aksi-aksi menegangkan.

Pertunjukan ini juga menampilkan pertunjukan berenergi tinggi yang membuat penonton tegang.

Kombinasi aksi yang memacu adrenalin, tampilan close-up kendaraan bertenaga, dan hiburan ramah keluarga menjadikan acara ini unik.

Pertunjukan Monster Truck Mayhem Thrills and Stunts menciptakan kenangan abadi bagi penggemar dari segala usia dan merayakan keseruan olahraga bermotor dalam lingkungan yang aman dan menarik.

Monster Truck Mayhem Thrills and Stunts Show offre un'esperienza indimenticabile per tutta la famiglia.

I visitatori possono ammirare enormi monster truck esibirsi in wheelstand, schiacciare auto ed eseguire acrobazie mozzafiato.

Lo spettacolo offre anche performance ad alta energia che tengono il pubblico con il fiato sospeso.

La combinazione di azione adrenalinica, viste ravvicinate di veicoli potenti e intrattenimento per famiglie rende questo evento unico.

Monster Truck Mayhem Thrills and Stunts Show crea ricordi indelebili per gli appassionati di tutte le età e celebra l'emozione degli sport motoristici in un ambiente sicuro e coinvolgente.

몬스터 트럭 메이헴 스릴 앤 스턴트 쇼는 잊지 못할 가족 경험을 선사합니다.

관객들은 거대한 몬스터 트럭들이 휠스탠드를 펼치고 차량을 압도하며 스릴 넘치는 스턴트를 선보이는 모습을 지켜볼 수 있습니다.

또한 관객들을 긴장감 넘치게 하는 강렬한 퍼포먼스도 준비되어 있습니다.

아드레날린이 솟구치는 액션 강력한 차량들의 근접 촬영 그리고 가족 친화적인 엔터테인먼트가 어우러진 이 행사는 특별한 경험을 선사합니다.

몬스터 트럭 메이헴 스릴 앤 스턴트 쇼는 모든 연령대의 팬들에게 잊지 못할 추억을 선사하며 안전하고 매력적인 환경에서 모터스포츠의 짜릿함을 만끽할 수 있는 기회를 제공합니다.

Die Monster Truck Mayhem Thrills and Stunts Show bietet ein unvergessliches Familienerlebnis.

Besucher erleben, wie riesige Monstertrucks Wheelstands machen, Autos zerquetschen und spannende Stunts vollführen.

Die Show bietet außerdem energiegeladene Darbietungen, die das Publikum fesseln.

Die Kombination aus adrenalingeladener Action, Nahaufnahmen leistungsstarker Fahrzeuge und familienfreundlicher Unterhaltung macht dieses Event einzigartig.

Die Monster Truck Mayhem Thrills and Stunts Show schafft bleibende Erinnerungen für Fans jeden Alters und feiert die Spannung des Motorsports in einer sicheren und spannenden Umgebung.

怪兽卡车惊险特技表演将为您带来难忘的家庭体验。

游客将看到巨型怪兽卡车表演倒车、碾压汽车以及惊险刺激的特技。

这场演出还提供充满活力的表演，让观众紧张刺激。

惊险刺激的动作场面、近距离观看强劲的车辆以及适合全家观看的娱乐节目，让这场活动独具特色。

怪兽卡车惊险特技表演将为各个年龄段的车迷留下难忘的回忆，并在安全有趣的环境中庆祝赛车运动的激情。

Le spectacle Monster Truck Mayhem Thrills and Stunts offre une expérience inoubliable en famille.

Les visiteurs peuvent admirer des monster trucks imposants effectuer des acrobaties écraser des voitures et réaliser des cascades palpitantes.

Le spectacle propose également des performances dynamiques qui tiennent le public en haleine.

L'association d'action palpitante, de vues rapprochées de véhicules puissants et d'animations familiales rend cet événement unique.

Le spectacle Monster Truck Mayhem Thrills and Stunts crée des souvenirs inoubliables pour les fans de tous âges et célèbre l'excitation du sport automobile dans un environnement sûr et stimulant.

El espectáculo de emociones y acrobacias Monster Truck Mayhem ofrece una experiencia familiar inolvidable.

Los visitantes ven a enormes monster trucks hacer paradas sobre ruedas, aplastar autos y ejecutar acrobacias emocionantes.

El espectáculo también incluye actuaciones llenas de energía que mantienen al público en vilo.

La combinación de acción y adrenalina, vistas de cerca de potentes vehículos y entretenimiento para toda la familia hace de este evento algo único.

El espectáculo de emociones y acrobacias Monster Truck Mayhem crea recuerdos imborrables para los aficionados de todas las edades y celebra la emoción del automovilismo en un entorno seguro y atractivo.

モンスタートラック・メイヘム・スリル＆スタントショーは、ご家族で忘れられない体験をお届けします。

巨大なモンスタートラックがホイールスタンドを披露したり、車を圧倒したり、スリリングなスタントを繰り広げる様子をご覧いただけます。

ショーでは、観客を釘付けにするハイテンションなパフォーマンスも披露されます。

アドレナリン全開のアクション、迫力満点のマシンを間近で見ることができるショー、そしてご家族向けのエンターテイメントが融合した、他に類を見ないイベントです。

モンスタートラック・メイヘム・スリル＆スタントショーは、あらゆる年齢層のファンに忘れられない思い出を創り出し、安全で魅力的な環境でモータースポーツの興奮をお届けします。

O Monster Truck Mayhem Thrills and Stunts Show oferece uma experiência familiar inesquecível.

Os visitantes assistem a enormes monster trucks fazendo paradas de rodas, destruindo carros e realizando acrobacias emocionantes.

O show também apresenta performances de alta energia que prendem a atenção do público.

A combinação de ação cheia de adrenalina, vistas de perto de veículos potentes e entretenimento para toda a família torna este evento único.

O Monster Truck Mayhem Thrills and Stunts Show cria memórias duradouras para fãs de todas as idades e celebra a emoção do automobilismo em um ambiente seguro e envolvente.

怪獸卡車驚險特技表演將為您帶來難忘的家庭體驗。

遊客將看到巨型怪獸卡車錶演倒車、碾壓汽車以及驚險刺激的特技。

這場演出也提供充滿活力的表演，讓觀眾緊張刺激。

驚險刺激的動作場面、近距離觀賞強勁的車輛以及適合全家觀賞的娛樂節目，讓這場活動獨具特色。

怪獸卡車驚險特技表演將為各個年齡層的車迷留下難忘的回憶，並在安全有趣的環境中慶祝賽車運動的熱情。

_source.productDescription:
Gather your friends for what will be a full day of fun and excitement at the iconic Eagle Farm Racecourse! 

They have plenty of delicious dining and beverage packages to suit everyone this festive season.

Enjoy every thrill on the track with three black type races – featuring two wildcards for the 2026 Magic Millions Raceday on the Gold Coast: the Group 3 Magic Millions BJ McLachlan (2YO Classic) and the Listed Magic Millions Falvelon (the Snippets).
_source.productShortDescription: Gather your friends for what will be a full day of fun and excitement at the iconic Eagle Farm Racecourse!

productComments.commentText:
Gather your friends for what will be a full day of fun and excitement at the iconic Eagle Farm Racecourse! 

They have plenty of delicious dining and beverage packages to suit everyone this festive season.

Enjoy every thrill on the track with three black type races – featuring two wildcards for the 2026 Magic Millions Raceday on the Gold Coast: the Group 3 Magic Millions BJ McLachlan (2YO Classic) and the Listed Magic Millions Falvelon (the Snippets).

¡Reúne a tus amigos para un día lleno de diversión y emoción en el icónico Hipódromo Eagle Farm!

Ofrecen una gran variedad de deliciosos paquetes de comida y bebidas para todos los gustos en esta temporada festiva.

Disfruta de la emoción de la pista con tres carreras de categoría negra, con dos comodines para el Magic Millions Raceday 2026 en Gold Coast: el Grupo 3 Magic Millions BJ McLachlan (Clásico de 2 años) y el Magic Millions Falvelon (The Snippets).

Verbringen Sie mit Ihren Freunden einen Tag voller Spaß und Spannung auf der legendären Eagle Farm Rennbahn!

Dort erwarten Sie zahlreiche köstliche Speise- und Getränkeangebote für jeden Geschmack in der festlichen Jahreszeit.

Erleben Sie Nervenkitzel pur auf der Rennbahn mit drei hochkarätigen Rennen – darunter zwei Wildcards für den Magic Millions Renntag 2026 an der Gold Coast: das Gruppe-3-Rennen Magic Millions BJ McLachlan (2YO Classic) und das Listed-Rennen Magic Millions Falvelon (The Snippets).

Raduna i tuoi amici per una giornata piena di divertimento ed emozioni all'iconico ippodromo di Eagle Farm!

Offrono tanti deliziosi pacchetti ristoro e bevande per tutti i gusti in questo periodo di feste.

Goditi ogni brivido in pista con tre corse di tipo "black type", con due wild card per il Magic Millions Raceday 2026 sulla Gold Coast: la Group 3 Magic Millions BJ McLachlan (2YO Classic) e la Listed Magic Millions Falvelon (the Snippets).

Reúna seus amigos para um dia inteiro de diversão e emoção no icônico Hipódromo de Eagle Farm!

Eles oferecem diversos pacotes deliciosos de comidas e bebidas para todos os gostos nesta época festiva.

Aproveite cada emoção na pista com três corridas de nível Black Type – incluindo duas vagas para o Magic Millions Raceday de 2026 na Gold Coast: o Grupo 3 Magic Millions BJ McLachlan (2YO Classic) e o Listed Magic Millions Falvelon (the Snippets).

Ajak teman-teman Anda untuk menikmati hari penuh keseruan dan kegembiraan di Eagle Farm Racecourse yang ikonis!

Mereka menawarkan beragam paket makan dan minuman lezat untuk semua orang di musim perayaan ini.

Nikmati keseruan di trek dengan tiga balapan black type – menampilkan dua wildcard untuk Magic Millions Raceday 2026 di Gold Coast: Grup 3 Magic Millions BJ McLachlan (2YO Classic) dan Listed Magic Millions Falvelon (Snippet).

快来和朋友们一起，在标志性的鹰场赛马场享受充满乐趣和刺激的一天吧！

节日期间，这里准备了丰富多样的餐饮套餐，总有一款适合您。

尽情体验赛道上的精彩刺激，观看三场精彩的黑体字赛事——其中两场是2026年黄金海岸神奇百万赛马日的外卡赛：三级赛神奇百万BJ麦克拉克兰锦标赛（两岁经典赛）和表列赛神奇百万法尔维隆锦标赛（小马驹赛）。

有名なイーグルファーム競馬場で、友達と集まって一日中楽しくエキサイティングな時間を過ごしましょう！

このホリデーシーズンには、誰もが満足できる美味しいお食事とドリンクのパッケージが豊富に用意されています。

ゴールドコーストで開催される2026年マジックミリオンズレースデーには、ワイルドカードとしてG3マジックミリオンズBJマクラクラン（2歳クラシック）とリステッドマジックミリオンズファルベロン（スニペッツ）の2つのレースが登場し、3つのブラックタイプレースで競馬のスリルを満喫できます。

Réunissez vos amis pour une journée inoubliable de divertissement et d'émotions fortes à l'emblématique hippodrome d'Eagle Farm !

De nombreuses formules de restauration et de boissons savoureuses sont proposées pour satisfaire tous les goûts pendant les fêtes.

Vivez des sensations fortes sur la piste avec trois courses de Groupe, dont deux courses qualificatives pour le Magic Millions Raceday 2026 sur la Gold Coast : le Magic Millions BJ McLachlan (Classique des 2 ans), Groupe 3, et le Magic Millions Falvelon (Les Snippets), Listed.

친구들과 함께 이글 팜 경마장에서 신나는 하루를 보내세요!

이번 축제 시즌에는 누구나 즐길 수 있는 맛있는 식사와 음료 패키지가 다양하게 준비되어 있습니다.

3개의 블랙 타입 경주에서 트랙의 스릴을 만끽하세요. 2026년 골드 코스트 매직 밀리언즈 레이스데이의 와일드카드 경주는 그룹 3 매직 밀리언즈 BJ 맥라클란(2세 클래식)과 리스티드 매직 밀리언즈 팔벨론(스니펫츠)입니다.

快來和朋友們一起，在標誌性的鷹場賽馬場享受充滿樂趣和刺激的一天吧！

節慶期間，這裡準備了豐富多樣的餐飲套餐，總有一款適合您。

盡情體驗賽道上的精彩刺激，觀看三場精彩的黑體字賽事－其中兩場是2026年黃金海岸神奇百萬賽馬日的外卡賽：三級賽神奇百萬BJ麥克拉克蘭錦標賽（兩歲經典賽）和表列賽神奇百萬法爾維隆錦標賽（斯尼普茨錦標賽）。
